summary: An ordinance relating to the plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of the existing municipal water works system contemplated by Ordinance No. 52260 (as amended by Ordinance No. 55300); eliminating certain items therefrom; reducing the amount of bonds authorized and issuable thereunder, and amending Sections 3 and 4 of said Ordinance No. 52260 (as amended) accordingly.
